title: Column icons not appearing when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons in the Data Explorer view are not showing up.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons in the Data Explorer view are not showing up.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, the expected behavior is for the column icons to be displayed in the Data Explorer view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and connect it to a Derby database using the following details:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
6.
